oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CBC vs Central High, Thursday November 17, 1955, Crump Stadium
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Football; Programs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The CBCHS football team played rival Central High at Crump Stadium on November 17, 1955. According to Brother Terence McLaughlin, the High School was regularly referred to as CBC because the high school division fell under the over-arching umbrella of Christian Brothers College.
